results.name: Number of alternating permutations on 2n+1 letters that avoid a certain pattern of length 4 (see Lewis, 2012, Appendix, for precise definition).
comment: 1 together with A007724. - _Omar E. Pol_, Aug 22 2016
link: J. B. Lewis, Pattern Avoidance for Alternating Permutations and Reading Words of Tableaux, Ph. D. Dissertation, Department of Mathematics, MIT, 2012.
mathematica: Table[(-1)^n HypergeometricPFQ[{-2 - 2 n, -2 n, -2 n - 1}, {2, 3}, 1], {n, 0, 20}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 22 2016 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 12 2012
ext: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Aug 22 2016
